Interface Camera

All Superinterfaces:
ControllerIO, Device, SonarObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
CameraImpl
public interface Camera extends Device
Camera for monitoring roadway conditions.
Author:
Douglas Lau, John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting

    • savePtzInfo

      void savePtzInfo()
      Save the current SONAR username as the most recent PTZ user and the current Epoch timestamp as the PTZ timestamp.

    • getPtzUser

      String getPtzUser()
      Get name of last user to attempt a camera motion (PTZ or camera preset-recall). Returns empty string if no attempt has been made.

    • getPtzTimestamp

      long getPtzTimestamp()
      Get Epoch timestamp when latest camera motion (PTZ or camera preset-recall) was attempted. Returns zero if no attempt has been made.
